plot: A powerful and explosive look into the barbaric turmoil Lance Corporal Butch Harding faces whilst serving his country. The film aims to raise awareness of the trauma caused to soldiers serving in Iraq and Afghanistan.
title: Second to None
plot_es: A powerful and explosive look into the barbaric turmoil Lance Corporal Butch Harding faces whilst serving his country. The film aims to raise awareness of the trauma caused to soldiers serving in Iraq and Afghanistan.
plot_en: A powerful and explosive look into the barbaric turmoil Lance Corporal Butch Harding faces whilst serving his country. The film aims to raise awareness of the trauma caused to soldiers serving in Iraq and Afghanistan.
